item.description:
Join us for this fun holiday weekend,

You Can Do It All...Or Nothing At All.
From mountains and a sparkling lake to tennis courts and softball fields, Getaway is a 300-acre playground with every game and adventure under the sun. We've recruited top professional athletes and instructors to teach you everything from biking, tennis and kayaking to yoga, wine tasting and dance.

How you spend your weekend is completely up to you. You can pack every minute with sports and adventure, sleep late and lounge by the lake all day, or mix things up with a little bit of everything. Just be sure to save enough energy for some evening playtime, too

http://LaborDayGetawa... , click on Book Now and choose Sept 4th!

Summer at its best! With an extra day of sports, parties, friends, laughing, dancing, waterfront, and everything else, the long weekend becomes an incredible getaway!!!!

Any questions, call me @ 917-868-4268 !

Call and text me friday night @ the boathouse for your free drink booklet and remember to mention Boston Meetup or Fun Meetup or Camp Meetup when booking to save $50
item.how_to_find_us: call & text Greg @ 917-868-4268 , meet at the welcome party friday night at the boathouse

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: Boston Meetup Presents our 2009 Labor Day Holiday Weekend (Fri-Monday)
